IDEProhibitOnDeviceModelInteraction.title: Disable Xcode Predictive Code Completion
IDEProhibitOnDeviceModelInteraction.description: Controls whether Xcode Predictive Code Completion is allowed.

IDEProhibitRemoteModelInteraction.title: Disable Swift Assist in Xcode
IDEProhibitRemoteModelInteraction.description: Controls whether Swift Assist is allowed.
